${ModID}:Auctioneering.NAME: Auctioneering
${ModID}:Auctioneering.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:VP. NL Gain Block equal to 1 / !M! your current ${ModID}:VP. NL Draw a Card.

${ModID}:Prosper.NAME: Prosper
${ModID}:Prosper.DESCRIPTION: Take an extra turn. NL Can only be played during ${ModID}:Victory. NL Purge.

${ModID}:Harvest.NAME: Harvest
${ModID}:Harvest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain ${ModID}:VP equal to double unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:IronMining.NAME: Iron Mining
${ModID}:IronMining.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If target enemy does not intend to attack, gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:VP.

${ModID}:MilitaryExpansion.NAME: Military Expansion
${ModID}:MilitaryExpansion.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to 1 / !${ModID}:m2! the amount of ${ModID}:VP gained this combat. NL ( !D! )
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I haven't gained any VP yet!

${ModID}:QuickGame.NAME: Quick Game
${ModID}:QuickGame.DESCRIPTION: Entering ${ModID}:Victory requires 25 less ${ModID}:VP. NL Minimum of 25.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Entering Victory requires 25 less VP. NL Minimum of 25. NL Innate

${ModID}:Roadbuilding.NAME: Roadbuilding
${ModID}:Roadbuilding.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain ${ModID}:VP from cards, gain !M! more.

${ModID}:SteelMilling.NAME: Steel Milling
${ModID}:SteelMilling.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only be used if you have entered ${ModID}:Victory this combat
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have not entered Victory yet!
